decks.notes: This deck focuses on utilizing a variety of counter spells, card draw spells, and tempo-based interactions to control the game while being aggressive with evasive creatures. The commanders, Feywild Visitor and Wilson, Refined Grizzly, provide a versatile and aggressive game plan that can apply pressure on opponents while disrupting their strategies. The key strategy is to maintain control of the game through countering key spells, drawing additional cards, and protecting your creatures with auras and other protective spells. By combining aggression with control elements, this deck aims to outmaneuver opponents and secure victory through a combination of combat damage and card advantage.

This deck revolves around utilizing a combination of cards to cheat powerful creatures into play from the graveyard, disrupt the opponent's hand, and control the board with removal and protection spells. The key strategy is to quickly fill the graveyard with creatures using cards like Entomb or Thoughtseize, then reanimate them with spells like Reanimate or Animate Dead. This combo-focused deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with powerful threats like Griselbrand or Iona, Shield of Emeria while disrupting their game plan with cards like Hymn to Tourach or Opposition Agent. By efficiently managing resources and timing reanimation spells for maximum impact, this deck aims to quickly close out games through powerful combos and overwhelming board presence.
